definition: dense and sticky substance/(dialect) wily old fox
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The preserved ham made by the local farmers is from the farm pigs which called "field fat".
sentences.chinese: 乡亲们做腊肉用的猪，就是被当地称为地油子的土猪。

sentences.english: The pipe is caked with tar.
He became sharper about Beijing after staying there only a few years.
sentences.chinese: 呆了几年就变成一个京油子了。

definition: soldier (from the two components of the 兵 character) (derog.)
to talk officiously/to assume the air of a functionary/to talk in official jargon
a much-travelled person, well acquainted with the ways of the world
to curse (at sb)/to call sb names
wine sack, food bag (idiom); useless person, only fit for guzzling and boozing
lit. to shout out hoping for fives and sixes when gambling with dice; a hubbub of gambling
